title: 412: CHATTY BROS: Bachelorette(s) Cast Bio Breakdown! (Part 1)
itunes:title: 412: CHATTY BROS: Bachelorette(s) Cast Bio Breakdown! (Part 1)
description:
The Bros are here and it’s their turn to break down the first half of Gabby and Rachel’s cast! Listen to their unfounded predictions and guesses about the men - and find out if The Broads or Bros are more spot on!

If you want to follow along visually, check out the Youtube version of this episode at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ 

Or check out the cast list pictures and bios at: https://abc.com/shows/the-bachelorette/cast 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FIGS: Head to WEARFIGS.COM and use code CHATTYBROADS to get 15% off your first order!

***SOFI: Visit SOFI.COM/CHATTY to learn how you can win up to $1000 in stock when you open an account!

***OUTSCHOOL: Head over to OUTSCHOOL.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to learn all about OutSchool’s summer programs and save $15 on your child’s first class! 

***STIR: Stir is the app designed for parents who just happen to be single! Download Stir or tell your single parent friends to try it out!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
